title: Beat the Heat With Cold Somen (Thin Japanese Dipping Noodles) | Kenji's Cooking Show
description:
Donate to No Kid Hungry here: https://p2p.onecause.com/livestreamfornokidhungry/kenji-alt-lopez


For the dipping sauce I combine:
- 80% dashi (you can use hondashi or make it yourself - see my video on miso soup for directions: https://youtu.be/U_Y9BUP3VVI)
- 10-15% mirin
- 5-10% shoyu

As usual, Nami from Just One Cookbook has an excellent article and recipe with more details on this dish if you are interested: https://www.justonecookbook.com/somen/
